name: Aquaman: Battle For Atlantis (Clone-Ish)
description:
An Aquaman: Battle For Atlantis Clone-Ish. It is a prototype of the first level, this was my first game and by no means a good nor polished one (living up to the original, kind of).

Controls:

WASD  - Forward, Backward, Left and right.

Space - Up.

C - Down.

Mouse Left Button - Attack.
